detail_desc: Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton cap with a print motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and cap sleeves that continue down the sides. Small opening and a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with an inset panel at the front and smocking at the back, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with embroidered, sequined appliqués on the knees.
Rib-knit scarf with fringes on the short sides. Size 30x180 cm.
Short-sleeved blouse in crêped mulberry silk with a round neck, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Rounded hem.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, gathered yoke at the back, and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a chest pocket with a button, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Trousers in an airy jacquard weave made partly from recycled polyester with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Concealed pockets in the side seams, a lower crotch and extra-wide legs. Jersey lining at the top.
Longer V-neck jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Flared skirt in soft cotton corduroy with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sunglasses with wide acetate frames and polarised, UV-protective lenses. Supplied with a printed lens cloth.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
One-shoulder body in sturdy jersey with one narrow shoulder strap with a metal detail at one end, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with wide ribbing around the neckline , low dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, decorative elastic straps at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted long-sleeved top in soft stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a wide lace-trimmed neck.

Fancy dress costume with a lace body and a sewn-in flared skirt in tulle. Body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups, a zip at the back and support panels at the front, back and sides. Lower section in glossy jersey and a skirt that ties with satin ribbons at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a metal fastening at the front.
Calf-length, long-sleeved dress in jersey containing glittery threads, with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and lacing at the sides.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif. Worn details around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Espadrilles with a jute trim around the soles. Cotton twill and leather linings, jute insoles and rubber soles.

Adjustable, shimmering on-ear headphones with a padded headband and appliqués at the top. Integral volume limiter set at 85 dB to protect your child’s hearing. Suitable for mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 3.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.

Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and raw-edge hem.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched inside. Darker sections where protective pieces of fabric have been ripped off after washing. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a brushed finish. Long raglan sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bohemian top in a viscose weave with short, frill-trimmed raglan sleeves. Elasticated top with a decorative tasselled bow, and a smocked hem.
Wide blouse in a soft weave with gathered details, a stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck and long, raglan, balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, a knot at the front and a fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with laser-cut edges and cutaway coverage at the back.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies. Diameter 4 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Pyjama bottoms in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length dress in glossy satin with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a double-layered wrapover bodice that ties at the back.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a regular, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt and side pockets.
Dress in slub cotton jersey with a print motif, short flounced sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt, pleats and the top and a zip in the side. Zip fly with hook and eye fasteners, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide tapered legs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed neckline.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with concealed press-studs at the back. Seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in patterned, washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Oversized, straight-cut, knee-length dress in stretch cotton twill with adjustable straps and an open chest pocket.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft fine knit made partly from recycled polyester. Wide ribbing at the top, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, zip at the top and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a double-layered hood, gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a sturdy, rib-knit cotton blend with a wide turned-up hem.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, tie detail at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with a yoke at the front trimmed with a flounce in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and short cap sleeves. Elasticated seam and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems.
Lace playsuit with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats below, a concealed zip in one side, and wide legs. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Padded, fabric-covered Alice band.
Lined bandeau bikini top with a concealed silicone trim at the top and lightly padded cups with removable inserts.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Patterned blouse in airy chiffon with a rounded collar with sewn-in ties at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Lined, non-wired triangular bikini top. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a metal decoration at the front. The shoulder straps can be undone at the back and fastened in various ways. No fasteners.
